title: Michelle Obama Wishes A Happy Birthday To 'The One And Only' Beyonc√©
text:
Michelle Obama Wishes A Happy Birthday To 'The One And Only' Beyonc√© "Thank you for being a role model for young girls around the world." Ashley Alman Politics Social Media Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 09/04/2015 01:36 PM EDT JEWEL SAMAD via Getty Images 
First lady Michelle Obama joined fans worldwide Friday in wishing Beyonc√© a happy birthday. 
Obama tweeted a personal message from her account thanking Queen Bey for "being a role model for young girls." Happy birthday to the one and only, Queen üêù! Thank you for being a role model for young girls around the world, @Beyonce . -mo ‚Äî The First Lady (@FLOTUS) September 4, 2015 
Obama and Beyonc√© have not been shy about their mutual adoration in the past. The first lady told rapper Wale last month that she would be Beyonc√© if she could have any other occupation. The artist has attended at least one of Obama's birthday celebrations , while the first lady has attended the singer's concerts. And in a letter to Obama at the start of husband President Barack Obama's second term, ÔªøBeyonc√© celebrated the first lady as "the ULTIMATE example of a truly strong African American woman." 
In case you're drawing a blank, here are 10 undeniable reasons Beyonc√© runs the world, from our friends at HuffPost Black Voices. ÓÄá
